original_text: But Israel did carry off for themselves the livestock and plunder of this city, as the Lord had instructed Joshua.
korean_text: 오직 그 성읍의 가축과 노략한 것은 여호와께서 여호수아에게 명령하신 대로 이스라엘이 탈취하였더라

sentences.original_text: But Israel did carry off for themselves
the livestock and plunder of this city
as the Lord had instructed Joshua
